title: Donegal Gr (DGICB) Stock Analysis Report
description: Explore Donegal Gr (DGICB) stock analysis with comprehensive data: access historical performance, financials, and insights. Updated August 2025
content:
Donegal Group Inc is an insurance holding company that offers businesses and individuals personal and commercial lines of property and casualty insurance. The company's reportable segments are its Investment function, Personal lines of insurance, and Commercial lines of insurance. Personal lines products consist mainly of homeowners and private passenger automobile policies. The Commercial lines products of its insurance subsidiaries consist mainly of commercial automobile, commercial multi-peril, and workers' compensation policies. The group mainly operates in the United States.

We grade stocks based on past performance, their future growth potential, intrinsic value, dividend history, and overall financial health. The chart below shows how we grade Donegal Gr ( DGICB ) across the board compared to its closest peers.

There are few things we like to see when evaluating the quality of a company's dividend history and future Ideally, we would like to see a company have a long history of consistently high dividend payouts that have grown at a consistent rate. From here we want to be confident that this sort of dividend growth and consistency will persist into the future. The chart below shows the historical trend in Donegal Gr ( DGICB ) dividend yield on an annual basis. Donegal Gr ( DGICB ) saw a decrease in it's dividend yield since 2020

The income statement also known as the profit and loss statement, primarily focuses on the company's revenues and expenses during a particular period. The main purpose of an income statement is to convey details of profitability and business activities. Below, is DGICB 's income statement for the previous four years along with its trailing-twelve- month profit & loss. The balance sheet is a snapshot of a companies financials during a particular period in time. It breaks down what company owns (assets) and what a company owes (liabilities), in order to give investors an overview of its capital structure. A companies statement of cash flows gives an investor a break down of the cash inflows and outflows from a companies operations and investment activities.
summary: Donegal Group Inc, an insurance holding company, offers personal and commercial lines of property and casualty insurance. The company's reportable segments include its Investment function, Personal lines of insurance, and Commercial lines. The analysis was conducted using past performance, future growth potential, intrinsic value, dividend history, and overall financial health. The income statement, the profit and loss statement, primarily focuses on the company's revenues and expenses during a period. The balance sheet also provides a snapshot of a company's financials, giving investors an overview of its capital structure. The chart below shows that Donegal Gr (DGICB) saw a decrease in it's dividend yield since 2020.
shortSummary: Donegal Group Inc is an insurance holding company that offers personal and commercial lines of insurance, with a consistent dividend history and financial health, which we grade based on past performance and dividends.
argos_summary: Donegal Group Inc is an insurance holding company that offers personal and commercial property and casualty insurance in the United States, with segments in investment, personal lines (homeowners and auto) and commercial lines (commercial auto, multi‑peril, workers’ compensation). The article reviews the company’s financial health, noting a decline in dividend yield since 2020 and presenting its income statement, balance sheet and cash‑flow statement for the past four years. It also compares Donegal’s performance to peers using a grading chart that evaluates past performance, growth potential, intrinsic value, dividend history and overall financial health.
